name: Elite Training Mat
description: The thick rubber of this mat absorbs sound and vibration, so your indoor training doesn't disturb your housemates or downstairs neighbours. It works well to keep sweat and bike grit off the floor, and you can use it for your cool-down stretches too.Thick 5mm rubber isolates sound and vibration.Anti-slip material provides a stable foundation.Dimensions are 190 x 75 x 0.5cm.
